articles.title: Hackers are exploiting a Sophos firewall zero-day - ZDNet
articles.description: Sophos releases emergency patch to fix SQL injection bug exploited in the wild, impacting its XG Firewall product.
articles.content:
Cyber-security firm Sophos has published an emergency security update on Saturday to patch a zero-day vulnerability in its XG enterprise firewall product that was being abused in the wild by hackers.
